<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Blockarg Node Formatting

Represents a `&blk` argument in the method definition (but not in the method call, see `BlockPass`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def with(context, &block)
  set(context)
  run(&block)
  unset(context)
end
```

After:

```ruby
def with(context, &block)
  set(context)
  run(&block)
  unset(context)
end
```

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def with(context, &block)
  [].each(&block)
end
```

After:

```ruby
def with(context, &block)
  [].each(&block)
end
```
